name: Bullet Zone
description: This game took part in the Brackey's GameJam 2021! The theme was "Let there be chaos" and the first thing that came to my mind was a Bullet Hell game, because that genre is really chaotic by nature! The game is a short platformer bullet hell game that can get really tricky in some parts! But i totally encourage you to try it out, collect all the guns and complete the game!
